dt-api.name: stateRestore.state().load()
dt-api.summary: Load a state from StateRestore into the table

type.description: Loads a stored state from the StateRestore extension into the table.
type.returns: Returns an DataTables Api for chaining.

dt-api.description:
This method provides the ability to load a state that is managed by the `-init stateRestore` extension into the table.
`-api stateRestore.state().load()` takes no arguments. It uses the state retrieved by the previous call to `-api stateRestore.state()` to identify the correct state.
A Datatables Api is returned so that further chaining can occur.
